overview: With over 15 years of experience in business formation, enterprise sales and executive management, Rick Luebbe leads EnerG2 as CEO. As co-founder and CEO of Hubspan, Luebbe raised the first round of financing, grew the company to 20+ employees and secured its flagship customer, a Fortune 20 manufacturer. As a management consultant with Booz Allen Hamilton, he specialized in manufacturing efficiency. And as a US Army officer, he led an aeroscout platoon in Desert Storm, and later flew Apaches as commander of an Attack Helicopter Company.
